title: How can I learn VMP analysisï¼Ÿ
content:
I am currently interested in learning reverse engineering, and I have a

  • foundation in assembly,
  • PE structure,
  • and the use of Win32Api.
  • And also have some of the foundation for writing Windows drivers;

I Can use IDA to analyze assembly code without confusion.

How can I learn VMProtect restoration analysis?
